physDesc.p: Fragments 1-13 (in mm), (1) 10 x 28, (A) 2 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (2) 46 x 44, (A) 5 lines, right margin, (B) traces, (3) 32 x 70, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (4) 61 x 39, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 37 x 26, (A) 4 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (6) 24 x 20, (A) 1 line, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 42 x 36, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 29 x 63, (A) 2 cols., (col. i) 5 lines, right margin, (col. ii) 2 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (9) 27 x 40, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 64 x 22, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 61 x 38, (A) 3 lines, top right bottom margins, (B) blank, (12) 56 x 51, (A) 2 lines, top left margins, (B) 1 line, top margin, (13) 49 x 67, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) 2 line, top right margin
